judges: Before Stern, C. J., Stearne, Jones, Bell and Chidsey, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Tbe order of the court below dismissing plaintiff’s complaint is affirmed, at the cost of appellant, on the opinion of Judge Crumlish.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: James L. Stern, Assistant City Solicitor, with Mm Matthew W. Bulloch, Jr., Assistant City Solicitor, and Abraham L. Freedman, City Solicitor, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Shender, Appellant, v. Philadelphia.
Argued November 11, 1953.
Before Stern, C. J., Stearne, Jones, Bell and Chidsey, JJ.
Edward Unterberger, for appellant.
James L. Stern, Assistant City Solicitor, with Mm Matthew W. Bulloch, Jr., Assistant City Solicitor, and Abraham L. Freedman, City Solicitor, for appellee.
January 4, 1954:
